content: कुष्ठः, --ष्ठं [<ls>Uṇ. 2. 2</ls>] {@--1@} Leprosy (of which there are 18 varieties); गलत्कुष्ठाभिभूताय च <ls>Bh. 1. 90.</ls> {@--2@} A sort of poison. --ष्ठा The mouth or opening of a basket.
